extendedInfo.description: Help your child succeed in the 11plus Maths exams and get into the school of your choice with this fun app.The First Past The PostÂ® series of apps, created by ElevenPlusExams Head For Successâ¢ team, in Verbal Reasoning, Mathematics, English, Vocabulary Building and Non-verbal Reasoning forms a comprehensive series of practice and revision aids to complement preparation for these demanding exams.This app covers all twenty seven types of maths questions found in the 11 plus and common entrance exams set by selective grammar and independent private schools in the United Kingdom and some other countries around the world.The types of questions contained in the app are : ââ¢ NUMBERS & EQUATIONS1 Addition and Subtraction2 Multiplication and Division3 Mixed Operations4 Number Value5 Factors and Multiples6 Number Sequences7 Decimal Numbers8 Special Numbers9 Number Machines10 Algebraâ¢ FRACTIONS, PERCENTAGE & RATIOS11 Fractions and Mixed Numbers12 Percentages13 Ratioâ¢ ANALYSING INFORMATION14 Representing Data15 Mean, Median, Mode and Range16 Probabilityâ¢ SCALES & MEASURES17 Reading Scales18 Length, Weight and Capacity Measure19 Dates, Time and Timetablesâ¢ SHAPES20 Lines, Angles and Bearings21 2-D shapes22 Perimeter and Area23 3-D shapes24 Volume25 Coordinates26 Transformations27 SymmetryThe app contains 25 questions of each type, a total of 675 questions, equivalent to over a dozen papers of the actual maths exam.Features included:â¢ POINTS SYSTEM - points awarded according to the time taken to answer each question.â¢ LEADER BOARD - showing the total points accumulated and the total number of tests done by the top 100 users with filtering by Boy, Girl or All.â¢ SCORES SAVED â scores of all attempts at a test are stored thus preventing cheating.â¢ TIMER CLOCK â time taken to answer each question is recorded.â¢ PROGRESS CHART - displays the score and time taken in the last 10 attempts of each test in the database.â¢ THREE MODES of use â unlimited time with ability to go back and change previous answers; exam mode limiting the time per question and exam mode limiting time per test.â¢ RANDOMISED QUESTIONS â each category test contains random questions in that category.â¢ TEST RESULTS REVIEW â ability to review whole test or to review only the questions answered incorrectly or skipped questions.â¢ EXPLANATIONS â for all questions.â¢ MOCK TEST â with randomised questions from the whole database.â¢ AWARD CERTIFICATES â a certificate is produced for each test result with option to email or save.â¢ USER LOGINS â ability for two users to be registered on one device.â¢ SETTINGS â allows three modes of practice and variable time settings.â¢ SOUND EFFECTS - Option to choose âonâ or âoffâ for sound effects and âshake to skipââ¢ EASY OF USE - very easy to use and intuitive.ElevenPlusExams, a division of Technical One Limited, are established knowledge experts in the 11 plus field supplying software and other products to schools, tutors and the public including tuition using state of the art technology. The company also hosts the UK's largest website and information portal for the 11 plus exams with over 25,000 web pages.First Past The PostÂ® and ElevenPlusExams Head for Successâ¢ are trademarks of Technical One Limited.
